name: SeqVec
innovation_summary: Transferred protein language embeddings to genomic variant effect prediction via ELMo encoders.

name: DNABERT
innovation_summary: Introduced k-mer tokenisation with BERT-style masked language modelling on genomic sequences.

name: Enformer
innovation_summary: Extended transformer receptive fields with dilated convolutions to predict gene expression from 200kb contexts.

name: GENA-LM
innovation_summary: Pretrained a single transformer on DNA, RNA, and protein to share representations across modalities.

name: Nucleotide Transformer
innovation_summary: Scaled masked nucleotide models to 2.5B parameters across 1000+ genomes for zero-shot annotation.

name: HyenaDNA
innovation_summary: Replaced attention with Hyena operators to capture million-token genomic dependencies efficiently.

name: DNAGPT
innovation_summary: Extended decoder-only transformers to write genomic regions and descriptions jointly for editing and variant prioritisation.

name: GenSLMs
innovation_summary: Combined mixture-of-experts transformers with sparse attention for pandemic-scale genomic monitoring.

name: xTrimoPGLM
innovation_summary: Unified DNA and protein language modelling with sparse experts to link regulatory sequences to expressed proteins.

name: GeneFormer
innovation_summary: Adapted foundation models to single-cell expression atlases with masked modelling and perturbation alignment.

name: GenomeGPT
innovation_summary: Applied autoregressive decoding to design regulatory DNA with controllable motifs.

name: EvoGene
innovation_summary: Integrated long-context transformers with diffusion priors to forecast adaptive genomic trajectories.
